text:
1. Grip the javelin firmly.
2. Position the body sideways to the target.
3. Take a few steps back to create momentum.
4. Begin running towards the throwing area.
5. Plant the front foot firmly into the ground.
6. Transfer the weight from the back foot to the front foot.
7. Extend the throwing arm backward.
8. Swing the arm forward while simultaneously rotating the body.
9. Release the javelin at the optimal point.
10. Follow through with the throwing motion.
